caption.center: Mary B. Webb v. George Travers Webb, III.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of December 2010 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:
"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of June 2011."
